meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mellissa Ahmed Morgan Polikoff Glenn Sullivan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6250.

td.p: Mellissa Ahmed, a legal editor from Ottumwa, Iowa
Morgan Polikoff, a professor of education policy originally from Hinsdale, Illinois
Glenn Sullivan, a psychology professor from Lexington, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,601)

tr.td: SEEING A BIT OF AMERICA
ALMA MATERS
EAT LIKE A HORSE
A LITTLE ALLITERATION
CRAZY 8s
ASSUME THE POSITION

tr.td: We're off to thank the Academy at the Kodak Theatre in this part of L.A.

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Mellissa] The films were Unforgiven and Million Dollar Baby.)
...
(Alex: [To Glenn] The films were Heaven Can Wait and Reds.)
MellissaWho is Clint Eastwood?
$400
GlennWho is Warren Beatty?
$5,000
MorganWho is Clint Eastwood
$2,800
(1 of) Clint Eastwood & Warren Beatty')

It's rare to get Oscar nominations for Best Director & Best Actor for the same film; he is 1 of the 2 who did it twice
Glenn
Morgan
Mellissa
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $25,000
3rd place: $1,000
Glenn
Morgan
Mellissa

2 W
(including 1 DD)

10 R,
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
